message.name: ENABLEPOWER
message.description: The ENABLEPOWER message which can make robot with eletric power on or off

message.name: ENABLEMOTOR
message.description: The ENABLEMOTOR message which enable eletric motor to move

message.name: CENTERFLYWHEEL
message.description: The CENTERFLYWHEEL message which reset fly wheel to center

message.name: CROSSOBSTACLE
message.description: The CROSSOBSTACLE message which make robot cross obstacle

message.name: ROTATEHEAD
message.description: The ROTATEHEAD message which rotate robot's head in clockwise or in anticlockwise
message.field: a float number between -1 and 1, negative number indicate head in clockwise rotation otherwise in anticlockwise

message.name: SWAYHEAD
message.description: The CENTERFLYWHEEL message which reset fly wheel to center
message.field: the number -1 0 1, negative number indicate shaking robot's head and 1 nod its head

message.name: MIGRATEDIRECTION
message.description: The MigrateDirection message which make robot migrates in diffirent direction with diffirent speed
message.field: a float number between -1 and 1, negative number indicate robot move to left with 0.x speed otherwise robot move to right
a float number between -1 and 1, negative number indicate move to backend with 0.y speed otherwise to foward
